claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.
explanation: A forest plot titled “Subgroup Analysis of Relative Vaccine Effectiveness against Influenza among Participants between 50 and 64 Years of Age, According to Preexisting Conditions.” It displays relative vaccine effectiveness (percentages with 95% CIs) of a recombinant influenza vaccine versus a standard-dose vaccine for PCR-confirmed influenza, hospitalization for PCR-confirmed influenza, and hospitalization for community-acquired pneumonia across subgroups with cardiovascular disease, respiratory disease, cardiorespiratory disease, obesity, diabetes, and any of the above conditions. The figure presents relative effectiveness data by subgroup but contains no information about antigenic match to WHO- or FDA-selected strains, and therefore does not support the claim.
